Public Member Functions

 is_special ($upc)
 handle ($upc, $json)

Detailed Description

WFC Electronic Special Orders

Special order upc format: prefix orderID transID 00454 xxxxxx xx

e.g., orderID #1, transID #1: 0045400000101

These IDs are used to locate the special order record in the PendingSpecialOrder table on the server database

Keyed array See the Parser class for array format
These modules supplement parsing to make UPC handling more customizable. The module will be invoked within a Paser object and hence uses the same return format.
